SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT024
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is used to request a retrieval of FIN messages previously sent or received by all logical terminals belonging to the requesting destination during the specified time range. If this message is sent by a master destination that owns synonyms, then FIN messages sent or received by all logical terminals of the master and all of its synonyms are retrieved.
Live BICs may retrieve messages up to 124 days old. Test & Training BICS may only retrieve messages up to 24 hours old.
From: User To: FIN

SystemField.Name: start-date-time
SystemField.description: Starting date and time (GMT) of time range for retrieval, in YYYYMMDDHHMM format.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: start-date-time
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Starting date and time (GMT) of time range for retrieval, in YYYYMMDDHHMM format.

SystemField.Name: end-date-time
SystemField.description: Ending date and time (GMT) of time range for retrieval, in YYYYMMDDHHMM format.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: end-date-time
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Ending date and time (GMT) of time range for retrieval, in YYYYMMDDHHMM format.
